text: Suchitra Bhattacharya (10 January 1950 â€“ 12 May 2015) was an Indian novelist. Over the past two decades, Suchitra had written about 24 novels and a large number of short stories in different leading Bengali literary magazines. Bhattacharya died on 12 May 2015 from cardiac arrest at her home in Dhakuria, Kolkata, aged 65. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest Category:20th-century Indian writers Category:Indian novelists
title: Suchitra Bhattacharya
